body: Hi Abraham, For some reason your input mesh was 49 copies of the same mesh. I selected the first one. MeshFromPoints need number of U and V which is 7 and 7 in your case. Please check the attached file. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/LWw0InctTwmjA-U*3St9xgfCka8rGy8o27ZnloCFGLv-hCJxN69Scol3WQba6llQncEfj7WDmObEC3UOms4fQTMbdq0vOzx1/3dMeshVis.png) Thanks you for adding the forth option. I will use it for coming workshops. Mostapha
